pages.text: The $(c)Sigil of the Bloodmoon$() grants the wielder dominion over the celestial cycle. The rising sun and the silver moon are no longer inevitable, but $(n)choices$().

By activating the sigil, you can $(6)force the passage of time$(). If the light of day is too bright, you can summon the $(4)shades of night$() instantly. If the darkness becomes too dangerous, you can command the sun to rise.
With a single $(6)Right-Click$(), you manipulate the rotation of the world itself. You are the conductor of the $(c)eternal dance$() between light and shadow.
